Package Model.Players

Class AIPlayer

java.lang.Object
Model.Players.Player
Model.Players.AIPlayer
public class AIPlayer extends Player
This class specializes Player to provide the artificial intelligence methods, in particular the method the simulates the human choice factor are :
  • choosing to say Uno (human players can forget so the AI should not be perfect too)
  • choosing to expose someone that forget to say Uno (human players can forget so the AI should not be perfect too)
  • choosing the best card to play
  • choosing the color when performing a Wild
In general for each of all the choices a human player performs, there has to be a corresponding AI method.
Author:
D'annibale Luigi, Venturini Daniele

    • chooseBestCards

      private List<Card> chooseBestCards(Card check)
      This method has been designed to be smart enough to decide which Card is the most convenient to play.
      Parameters:
      check - : the card that is on top of the discards
      Returns:
      a List of Card representing the cards, sorted from the most convenient to the less.
